roleset.name: write untidily
roleset.note: SCRAWL-V NOTES: Member of Vncls scribble-25.2. Updated by Julia, 11/2011. (from scrawl.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Somebody had scrawled American Express, Piazza di Spagna?, across the envelope, and now Theresa had it, all as easily as if she had been the President of the Republic or the Pope.

roleset.name: write completely but untidily
roleset.note: SCRAWL_OUT-V NOTES: See Vncls scribble-25.2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from scrawl.02-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: Across the table in Fisher's class, a boy scrawled out a message that read like a text message: "I C a HOS."
example.arg: Across the table in Fisher's class
a message that read like a text message: "I C a HOS."
